items.sentence: Tom has been sitting in front of his computer all day.
Tom loves telling the story about how he and Mary met.
How we\'re going to deal with that remains a question.
I asked Tom if I could borrow thirty dollars from him.
Tom wouldn\'t tell Mary what his telephone number was.
All things considered, we cannot say that he is wrong.
Tom said that Mary was pretty good at speaking French.
Tom said that he loved Mary and always would love her.
Tom said that he might want to try doing that someday.
Tom said that he thought he smelled something burning.
